Detailed Description

contains data on one service - taken from the broker's module registry.

Definition at line 132 of file ServiceDescriptor.h.

SystemsBiologyWorkbench::ServiceDescriptor::ServiceDescriptor (  DataBlockReader    r )  [inline]
 

create a ServiceDescriptor object using data extracted from a data block.

The cursor of the DataBlockReader is move to the first object after the descriptor data.

Parameters:
r  data block containing service descriptor data

Referenced by getServiceInModuleInstance.

SBW_API Service ServiceDescriptor::getServiceInModuleInstance (    ) 
 

returns the service described by the service descriptor.

Locates a module instance that implements the given service. May or may not create a new module instance to implement the service depending on the module management type of the implementing module.

Returns:
the service described by the service descriptor.
